tool.name: SAGA.grid_gridding.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayFIELD False isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES output_data_CATEGORY $output_data_CATEGORY output_data_COVERAGE $output_data_COVERAGE name SAGA.grid_gridding.10 POLYGONS $POLYGONS FIELD $FIELD METHOD $METHOD MULTIPLE $MULTIPLE TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES outputType_CATEGORY $OutputSection_CATEGORY.outputType_CATEGORY transmissionMode_CATEGORY $OutputSection_CATEGORY.transmissionMode_CATEGORY outputType_COVERAGE $OutputSection_COVERAGE.outputType_COVERAGE transmissionMode_COVERAGE $OutputSection_COVERAGE.transmissionMode_COVERAGE

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Category
param.help: The attribute field that specifies the category a polygon belongs to. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: METHOD
param.label: Method
param.help: Choose cell wise, if you have not many polygons. Polygon wise will show much better performance, if you have many (small) polygons.

param.name: MULTIPLE
param.label: Multiple Polygons
param.help: Output value for cells that intersect wiht more than one polygon.

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_CLASSES
param.label: Classification
param.help: Classification look-up table for interpretation of resulting grid cell values.

section.name: OutputSection_CATEGORY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_COVERAGE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This tool has been designed to rasterize polygons representing categories and selects that category, which has maximum coverage of a cell. The advantage using this tool (instead the more simple 'Shapes to Grid' or 'Polygons to Grid' tools) is that it summarizes all polygon coverages belonging to the same category.
